predicate.note: Frames file for 'hiss' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus.

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` What 's he doing [*T*-93] ? '' hissed [*T*-1] my companion , who [*T*-91] was the only other English-speaking member of the convention and whose knuckles [*T*-92] were white .
example.arg: my companion , who [*T*-91] was the only other English-speaking member of the convention and whose knuckles [*T*-92] were white
